name: Butch
intro: I'm a 15-year veteran barber dedicated to making you look and feel good. I strive to give the best service and experience this industry has to offer.
speciality: Cutting short to medium hair styles, disconneciton, fades, design, precision bobs, clasic barder techniques. Collaborationg with my guest to find what works for them.

intro: Iâ€™m Barbara. I specialize in the art of barbering, haircuts and shaves.

name: Mike
intro: Hi, I'm Mike. Cutting hair has been my hobby for ten years. Barbering at this cool yet professional barbershop will heighten my skills, talent, and techniques. Learning is a never-ending experience. What a great atmosphere to do it in!
